name: Clumsy Bee
description:
Bring the pollen back to the hive! 

But the more you carry the worse you will fly!

Watch out for ants and hornets!

Supports: Keyboard/Mouse and Controller.

Art/Assets: Cristian Acebes Prado

https://twitter.com/metallitas

Game Design/ Scripting: Joel Gray

https://twitter.com/JoelTheGray

This game was made as a part of Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3! in just a few days! https://itch.io/jam/blackthornprod-game-jam-3
